work_summary: Activated for S2A Phase 3. Implemented Database Manager MCP server. Established coordinations with Agent-7 (Web Domain Index) and Agent-8 (SSOT Tagging Fixes). Fixed tag_analyzer.py bug.
decisions_made: Database Manager MCP restricted to SQLite for initial safety
Query validation implements strict keyword checking for readonly vs write operations
Coordination with Agent-8 uses small PR-ready batches for SSOT tagging
tradeoffs: SQLite support only in DB MCP avoids complex MySQL configuration overhead but limits immediate WordPress DB access
Read-only defaults in DB MCP prioritize data safety over speed

cold_start_handoff.current_state: Agent-5 active, DB MCP registered, coordinations ongoing
immediate_priorities: Create wordpress_health_check(site_key) tool for validation-audit MCP (✅ COMPLETE)
Monitor Agent-8 tagging fixes and validate scoring delta (Batch 1 ✅, Batch 2 ⏳)
Scan web domain for index-to-FS alignment (Agent-7 coordination)
blockers: GA4/Pixel ID configuration (Agent-3) blocks Tier 1 analytics validation

knowledge_persisted: Tag analyzer bug fix: fixed scope error in list comprehensions
DB query safety patterns: keyword-based validation and Uri-mode ro/rw
Web Domain Index structure and owner responsibilities
next_focus: WordPress health checks and coordination synchronization
